body.name: Rug Area Rug Carpet Modern Rugs for Living Room Bedroom Corridor Carpet Soft Non-Slip Rug Indoor Carpet Washable Abstract Carpet (Brown/Gold, 3' 11" x 5' 3")
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 33 mins
features: 【Comfortable and Versatile】This abstract rug is made of high-quality polyester material, non-skid, stain resistant, superb craftsmanship, edge binding, absorbent, and breathable. It is eco-friendly and has high durability. This premium soft and comfortable area rug is durable enough for high-traffic areas like the living room, dining room, kitchen, entry, bedroom, playroom, or home office.

【Easy to Clean and Care】Easy to clean and washable,you can use the vacuum cleaner to clean the surface of the fuzzy rug from debris, hair or dust, spot clean with a solution of water, or clean professionally when needed. Allow your rug to air dry completely before the next use.

【Safety Anti-slip Carpet】 The back of the artificial fur carpet is made of anti-slip material, which is anti-slip and durable, helping to maintain the position of the carpet, friendly to children and pets, reducing the risk of tripping, and protecting the floor from scratches.

【Precautions for Foldable Carpet】- The carpet is vacuum portable packaging for transportation or carrying, so there may be temporary wrinkles on arrival. Roll the carpet in the opposite direction, while applying pressure to the carpet to eliminate wrinkles. You may need to place some large or heavy objects on the carpet to help flatten it.

【Worry-free Warranty】We will do our best to serve you. If you have any problems for use our area rugs within 30 days, please feel free to contact us, and we will give you the most satisfactory answer within 24 hours.
body.description: "YR16 Cinknots Brown/Gold 16 rugs elevate your home decor with abstract patterns, retro-chic touches, and high-quality polyester materials, bringing a wealth of warm comfort and unique style to your home decor. The short piles are easy to clean, and won't fade or shed their fur. It’s so healthy and comfortable, durable, that is kid- and pet-friendly. The bottom is made of non-slip rubber bottom, which is safe and non-slip, ideal for daily indoor high-traffic areas and areas that are more prone to chaos in life due to children or pet activities, such as living room, bedroom, kitchen, children's room, nursery, hallway, office, etc.Material: Polyester.Color: Brown/Gold 16.Shape: Rectangle.Recommended Use: Indoor use only.Packing: Vacuum packing.Warm Tip: Since our rugs are packed in vacuum bags, after unpacking, the area rugs look a little more wrinkled than the original, but don't worry, they will return to their original shape after 10 days. Please allow a 1-3cm error due to manual measurement. Due to different camera or light environments, there is a slight difference in color difference, which is a normal phenomenon."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and simple rug for living room
reviews.reviewText: Simple rug that fits the style and the size of my living room. The rug I received just looks like the pictures show. The design is abstract and simple, but it makes the living room looks cozy. It feels fluffy and soft. It is also relatively easy to clean. I just vacuum and use a damp cloth to wipe it, so far no stain left. Satisfying with the quality and the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft! Love it!
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful rug. Nice and soft . Will looks for others in another color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This rug has brought an element of style, comfort and safety into my living room. It is incredibly soft. It’s a good choose for anyone who are looking to enhance their living space with a combination of comfort and style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Why shrink wrap?
reviews.reviewText: The only problem I have with his product is that the shipper put these rugs in shrink wrap. I don’t know that I’ll be able to get the wrinkles out as a result. Other than that the design of the rug is beautiful but I’m not too sure I’ll be able to keep the rugs if I can’t get the wrinkles out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute rug but not as described
reviews.reviewText: it is a very cute and soft rug it’s just way smaller than it said it was going to be should have sized up a little disappointed for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The rug is soft and fluffy. It’s got thick cushion that’s non slipping and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and soft
reviews.reviewText: This area rug is so beautiful. The colors are muted pastels and blend together seamlessly. It is a low pile rug but it is sooooo very soft. Unfortunately I have to return it because I measured the space incorrectly and it’s too big. I do intend to get the same rug though just in the correct size :)
Parce un poco cobertor pero está muy bonito

reviews.reviewTitle: IS A VERY NICE ABSTRACT RUG
reviews.reviewText: I like this rug. For the money I paid it is well worth the price. It is very soft, colorful and vacuums very nice.

reviews.reviewText: Luv this rug it's so soft! I have pets so this is great for them...and at that price I'm getting one for the bedroom the colour is beautiful 😍
